name: Umi (rsluk)
description:
Woken up with no recollection of their past memories, the game follows a protagonist who finds out that they operate a food cart every night. 

Umi. The name of the shop. It is a term that means, "food that warms you up from the inside". And it is certainly one that will help customers get through the cold night in this unknown world.

Although their memories are lost, their skill in cooking is still intact. With the help of regular and new customers, they learn more about not only themselves but also the personal stories behind the people they cook for.
